name: eeef Graphics Engine
short_description:
"eeef" Graphic Engine is just another graphic engine try. It is called "eeef" because it uses GLEW and GLFW, and I just find the "E" in GLEW and "F" in GLFW are so cute. So I decide make a name with "E" and "F". "ee" and "ef" just refers the pronunciation of "E" and "F".

I want this project to be a test-field of my computer graphics knowledge and some new ideas. And a platform to communicate with computer graphics gurus(hope so).

If it interests you, please contact me: racnil@yahoo.com.cn
